hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Left Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #4# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Double Defense#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Zora Shop#.

hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Front Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
